Meetings and Presentations

We organize a weekly presentation (3PM every Friday) on presenting an interesting research paper by a team member. It is open to public, and you are free to attend and join the discussion.

Search Presentations

© IntelliStream Research Group.

We are part of the Parallel and Distributed Computing Lab (PDCL) at the Nanyang Technological University. We are also affiliated to DANTE (DATA MANAGEMENT @NANYANG TECH) group
